website_summaries.verdict: The Audiofly AF160 is an in-canal earphone pair intended for music purists who love flat audio reproduction.
cons: Distorts on deep bass tracks at top volumes

customer_reviews.title: Either they're terrible or mine were faulty.
customer_reviews.text: Either they're terrible or mine were faulty. The unboxing experience was fine, it has plenty of different tips to choose from and the comfort is great. However mine sounded terrible. Like I was listening from inside a fish tank or something. The frequencies were all bleeding into each other and the clarity wasn't anything like I expected. I thought this could be due to the tip and tried to change them but they were seemingly impossible to get off and when trying to pull one off the casing of the iem actually split, So yeah a tad dissapointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A true audiophile earphone!
customer_reviews.text: I've always used dynamic earphones and along the way tried many balanced armature earphone's and have hated every pair. These earphones are the most detailed I've ever heard. Some might say they lack in bass but they don't it's just neutral. If you're after bass look at the sennheiser ie80 but for all out detail and imaging these are faultless.
customer_reviews.author: nathan

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: These really are great headphones. Highly recommend. The overall turning could be described as "warm", which is perfect for the vast majority of people. Lows are BA lows, so they are less powerful than dynamic but more precise and integrated. But I prefer that to dynamic lows. Bass still can be very decent - but just know a BA driver cannot produce dynamic base no matter how good it is, its just more of a preference. Mids and highs are great (to be expected) but what really stands out about these is how the whole package comes together. The soundstage and accuracy is just great. Get a headphone dac amp and some flac files and they sound even better.
customer_reviews.author: Max Seymour

customer_reviews.title: They’re an absolute dream!
customer_reviews.text: I tried so, so many IEM’s. Initially I wanted a wireless set, so started with the Jabra elite 65t’s, the RHA True connects, and then the Sennheiser momentum true wireless. Non of them had what I needed, and I realised I could get a much better wired sounding pair for a similar price. Enter the AF180’s. They’re extraordinarily comfortable. They sound absolutely spectacular. The level of detail is astonishing. Often times, when IEM’s have great detail, they do so by reducing the levels of bass. However, somehow, these IEM’s produce microscopic levels of detail and clarity whilst maintaining solid levels of bass, so it never feels thin or aenemic. 100% recommend if you want a quality pair of IEM’s.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the burn in period.
customer_reviews.text: On first listen I wasn't impressed having spent over £300. However, these have improved on each listen and they sound superb. They have accurate bass but are not for bass heads. Getting the isolation (tip fitting) right is crucial. Take the time to see which tips work for you. This is not a waste of time. They are what I would call a leisurely quality listen. I can listen for long periods whether on my Samsung Galaxy S8 (Spotify and Tidal) or my Astell & Kern Kann (Flac format and Tidal streaming). On the Kann I prefer using these to my Bowers & Wilkins PX. Money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: jcd

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is superb, I use these more than my Audeze LCD-X's
customer_reviews.author: S. Orchard

customer_reviews.title: detail and clarity is amazing. Your own private world of music
customer_reviews.text: Sublime in ear monitors .detail and clarity is amazing. Your own private world of music .
customer_reviews.author: garymac

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor, but no replacement cable.
customer_reviews.text: Good monitors, but there's a catch: you can't buy the replacement cables in the UK. Audiofly doesn't ship to the UK, and there doesn't seem to be any suppliers in the country. Audiofly won't reply to enquiries either, a big red flag. I advise thinking twice!
customer_reviews.author: Oli

customer_reviews.title: I found it pretty good. I am not an expert on earphone
customer_reviews.text: After listening quite a while, I found it pretty good. I am not an expert on earphone, so...
customer_reviews.author: bu62963

customer_reviews.title: Truly truly wonderful IEM's on a monumental scale
customer_reviews.text: Purely stunning in clarity and depth, bang for buck these excel where many twice the price fail hard. Truly truly wonderful IEM's on a monumental scale.

customer_reviews.title: The build quality seems very good, they are VERY comfortable compared to any other ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had high end Shure and Klipsch IEMs and i must say that these beat them all. The build quality seems very good, they are VERY comfortable compared to any other IEMs i have ever worn and the sound quality is quite excellent. Really warm and well balanced with a fantastic range. Wow, i am impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Nanoboy

product_meta.title: Audiofly AF160 In Ear Monitor Earphones - Resin Red
product_meta.description:
Colour Name:Resin Red

AF160 – Triple Armature Driver Earphone Professional In Ear Monitoring ABOUT AUDIOFLY
Based in Australia, Audiofly are guided by their obsession as musicians to design and build headphones with ultimate clarity and musicality. With an eye on the classic designs of the past, Audiofly are fueled by a passion to push new boundaries: Drivers customised for insane detail, super strong CORDURA fabric cables and hybrid speaker configurations for warmth and accuracy.

ABOUT THE AUDIOFLY AF160
The Audiofly AF160 has an advanced hybrid mini speaker configuration. Engaging and detailed sound comes together with seriously tough construction to make an earphone even Rock Stars are crazy about using. The three balanced armature drivers deliver incredible clarity: Two large and one small with a crossover in each ear for seamless collaboration. Whether you’re a musician performing on stage or an audiophile who demands the very best sound, Audiofly IEMs are serious sonic companions.

BUILT FOR THE ROAD
Not only is the AF160 full of multi driver audio technology but the engineers at Audiofly have made every effort to ensure a tough construction, built to withstand the rigours of touring with a musician. Fitted out with small ergonomic bodies, a malleable cable attachment for over ears wearing and an Audioflex SL cable built for the stage. This unique super light twisted replaceable cable is then reinforced with a tough CORDURA fabric covering for its remainder.

THE AF160 SOUND
Audiofly have given the AF160 a clean sound with excellent articulation and sound stage. Very clear and natural bass delivery is produced by the two larger micro drivers handling the bottom end. The smaller balanced armature driver produces lush mids with a smooth transition to the crisp but calm top end. Detail is the standout feature of the AF160 sound, whilst the top end never becomes fatiguing, instrument separation and movement within the stereo image are simply outstanding.

INSIDE THE BOX
 * Audiofly AF160 Professional In Ear Monitors 
 * Audioflex SL super light twisted replaceable cable reinforced with a tough CORDURA fabric covering. 
 * Three sizes of single domed sound isolating silicon tips. 
 * A single pair of tri-flange silicon tips to provide better isolation, vastly reducing external noise. 
 * Comply Premium heat reactive foam tips to provide even better isolation and comfort, vastly reducing external noise. 
 * 1/4 inch / 6.35mm Jack adaptor 
 * Airline adaptor 
 * Cleaning tool 
 * Leather Wallet – Protect your earphones whilst out and about, with ample storage space for tips and accessories.

AUDIOFLY AF160 BUILT FOR MUSIC
Incredible fit and comfort - Ergonomically designed with malleable cable attachment to stay in the ear comfortably. Solid construction – built to handle strenuous use. Audioflex SL replaceable cable - Super light twisted cable reinforced with a tough CORDURA fabric covering. Sound Isolation - Designed to seal the music in with the large choice of different eartips, so lower volume requirements protect your hearing from damage. Built for Music – Used by touring musicians worldwide!

BOX CONTAINS
Audiofly AF160 Resin Red

3 Tri-flange silicon eartips (S/M/L)

Storage wallet
6.35mm jack adaptor
Airline adaptor
Shirt clip
Cleaning tool

Includes USA made Comply Foam tips for superior isolation
Audio flex SL cable; roadworthy and built for the stage
Waxed canvas case for protection of your IEMs
